title: Business Analyst
description:
About Us:

At StatusNeo, we are committed to redefining the way businesses operate. As a leader in digital transformation, we leverage cutting-edge technologies and innovative strategies to empower organizations around the globe. Our partnerships with industry giants and our commitment to continuous learning and improvement provide an unparalleled platform for professional growth. Embrace a career at StatusNeo, where we value diversity, inclusivity and foster a hybrid work culture.




Position: Business Analyst

Location: India

Type: Full-time, Remote




Responsibilities:

Analyze business processes and workflows to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
Gather, document, and validate business requirements from stakeholders.
Develop detailed business and functional specifications for new systems and processes.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including IT, operations, and management, to implement solutions.
Conduct data analysis to support business decisions and identify trends.
Prepare and deliver reports, presentations, and recommendations to stakeholders.
Assist in project management tasks, including planning, scheduling, and tracking project progress.
Support the development and implementation of business strategies and initiatives.
Perform user acceptance testing (UAT) and ensure that solutions meet business needs.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to provide insights and recommendations.




Qualification

1 year of professional experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role.
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques (e.g., Excel, SQL).
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to document and translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Basic understanding of project management principles.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
